query: Check the EBITDA values between the IPO prospectus and the Annual report. Do they match?
expected_answer: Yes, from the values provided, the EBITDA values for 2019 are consistent.
output:
They do not match.

- Prospectus (six months ended 30 June 2020): EBITDA = NOK 160.0 million (see Section 10.7.1 and the condensed income statement).
- Annual report (full year 2020, as shown in your appendix): Adjusted EBITDA totals and reconciliation are presented, and a reconciliation shows “Depreciation and amortization –271,389” and “Adjusted EBITDA 390,842” for 2020; from that reconciliation Operating profit 22,218 and Finance income (expense) -427,047 give Profit (loss) before tax -404,829. The Annual Report also lists Mobile messaging revenue etc. but the explicit plain “EBITDA” figure for the same period/line is not the same 160.0 million reported in the Prospectus.

Conclusion: the Prospectus EBITDA of NOK 160.0 million (six months to 30 June 2020) is not the same as the Annual Report’s 2020 EBITDA/Adjusted EBITDA figures (which are on a different basis/period — Annual Report shows Adjusted EBITDA 390,842 for the full year 2020). The amounts differ because they cover different periods and definitions (Prospectus figure is six‑month EBITDA; Annual Report figures are full‑year Adjusted EBITDA and include different adjustments).
